name: Specimen.collection.bodySite
title: Specimen.collection.bodySite
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Anatomical location from which the specimen was collected (if subject is a patient). This is the target site.  This element is not used for environmental specimens.
element.comment: If the use case requires  BodySite to be handled as a separate resource instead of an inline coded element (e.g. to identify and track separately)  then use the standard extension [bodySite](extension-bodysite.html).

binding.description: Codes describing anatomical locations. May include laterality.
